title: Pistruiatul
overview: In a small town of province, the members of Illegals Movement prepare the release day. Pistruiatul (Costel Bloiu), a funny boy of 14 years, becomes the hero of this events led in secret by his friend Andrei. Helped by his History teacher, by his father, and many times by his best friend, a dog named Calu, the kid wins every battle against the regime or bad people.
